title: Club Member with spam links (hacked)
body: Hello Riot and LoL community. I have a member in my club who's account will randomly post a spam link to a Champ Riven skin. I've talked with him to stop. He says its not him and he cant do anything about it. I recommended he talk with riot to resolve the issue.   He responded " listen, i cant do anything about it neither can they, we tried. I didnt do anything."    Is there an issue that Riot cant help players with account hacks? or is he just BSing me? I like the player and would love to keep him in the club, but we have new player member and i don't want to get them hacked.   Let me know thanks community!

replies.body:
It sounds like your club member may not have their account secured. I'd recommend they check out the following links to ensure no one else can access their account to post phishing links.

[Summoner Security Initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664)

[Account Management](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)

[Email Verification](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you you Targons Blade ill pass the links on to my club member. Ill let you know if anything comes of it! Really appreciate your feedback :)
